title: Lindsay Lohan Claims She Was Racially Profiled in London
text:
Screengrab via Good Morning Britain/YouTube BTW 
Oft-troubled A-lister Lindsay Lohan —both red-headed and blue-eyed—has laid claim to experiencing racial profiling by customs officials at London’s Heathrow Airport. She says she was wearing a headscarf, styled as a hijab. 
Lohan said she wore the scarf out of respect to Turkish people and to hide her identity. 
“When I was flying to New York recently. I was wearing a headscarf and I got stopped at the airport and was racially profiled for the first time in my life,” she told Good Morning Britain on Tuesday. “What scared me was that moment, how would another woman who doesn’t feel comfortable taking off her headscarf feel? That was really interesting to me. I was kind of in shock.” Lindsay Lohan says she was "racially profiled" at an airport because she was wearing a headscarf. pic.twitter.com/REOR6aCWnV — Not Jerry Tipton (@NotJerryTipton) February 21, 2017 
Lohan was apparently confused on the differences between racial and (potential) religious discrimination. For her part, Lohan has admitted to being curious about Islam , but has yet to convert. Lindsay Lohan:" I was racially profiled."
